_description: ‘Margaret Meek’ — three 8-line stanzas (aaabcccb) with a 4-line introductory heading and burden: ‘So manerly / So curtesly / So prately / She delis allway’

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
That goodly lasWhen she me basAlas alasI wote not
                    where…
